statements: SELECT * FROM twitter_sentiment;
SELECT tweet_text, sentiment_score FROM twitter_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT tweet_id, tweet_text FROM twitter_sentiment WHERE tweet_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM twitter_sentiment ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT tweet_text FROM twitter_sentiment WHERE tweet_text LIKE '%happy%';
SELECT tweet_id, tweet_text, sentiment_score FROM twitter_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT tweet_id, tweet_text FROM twitter_sentiment WHERE LENGTH(tweet_text) > 50 ORDER BY tweet_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM twitter_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2 AND CHAR_LENGTH(tweet_text) > 100 ORDER BY tweet_id ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT tweet_id, sentiment_score FROM twitter_sentiment WHERE tweet_text LIKE '%positive%' OR tweet_text LIKE '%happy%' ORDER BY tweet_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT tweet_id, tweet_text, sentiment_score FROM twitter_sentiment WHERE tweet_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7) ORDER BY tweet_id ASC;
SELECT id, username, location, follower_count FROM twitter_users;
SELECT follower_count, location, username, id FROM twitter_users;
SELECT * FROM twitter_users WHERE follower_count > 1000;
SELECT id, username, follower_count FROM twitter_users WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT MAX(follower_count), MIN(follower_count), AVG(follower_count) FROM twitter_users;
SELECT * FROM twitter_users WHERE follower_count > 1000 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, username, location FROM twitter_users WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, follower_count FROM twitter_users WHERE follower_count BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT username, follower_count FROM twitter_users WHERE follower_count < 5000 AND location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY follower_count ASC, username ASC;
SELECT ts.id, ts.sentiment_score, ts.timestamp, tu.username FROM twitter_sentiments ts JOIN twitter_users tu ON ts.tweet_id = tu.id ORDER BY ts.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM tweets;
SELECT tweet_text, created_at FROM tweets WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT tweet_id, tweet_text FROM tweets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_scores WHERE sentiment_type = 'positive';
SELECT opportunity_id, opportunity_description FROM trading_opportunities WHERE tweet_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM tweets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT tweet_text, user_id FROM tweets WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT tweet_id, sentiment_score, sentiment_type FROM sentiment_scores;
SELECT * FROM trading_opportunities WHERE opportunity_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT tweet_text, created_at FROM tweets WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM tweets ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT tweet_text, sentiment_score FROM tweets WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT username, profile_pic_url FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT hashtag_text FROM hashtags ORDER BY hashtag_id ASC
SELECT * FROM trade_opportunities WHERE action = 'buy' ORDER BY opportunity_id
SELECT * FROM tweets WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_handle, tweet_text FROM tweets WHERE LENGTH(tweet_text) > 100 ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC
SELECT username, profile_pic_url FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john%' AND profile_pic_url IS NOT NULL
SELECT tweet_text, user_handle FROM tweets JOIN users ON tweets.user_handle = users.username WHERE sentiment_score < 0
SELECT tweet_id, hashtag_text FROM trade_opportunities JOIN hashtags ON trade_opportunities.opportunity_id = hashtags.hashtag_id
SELECT * FROM tweet_sentiments;
SELECT tweet_id, sentiment_score FROM tweet_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, username, follower_count FROM users ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT symbol, trade_type, trade_date FROM trades WHERE trade_type = 'Buy' ORDER BY trade_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trade_id, sentiment_score, sentiment_date FROM trade_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score < 0 ORDER BY sentiment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM tweet_sentiments ORDER BY tweet_id DESC;
SELECT username, follower_count FROM users WHERE follower_count > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT hashtag_text FROM hashtags;
SELECT trade_id, symbol, trade_date FROM trades WHERE trade_type = 'BUY' ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT sentiment_score, sentiment_date FROM trade_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_date DESC;
